title: Traversing Data in Reverse
description: For this task, look over the random.csv data set and change the program so it traverses column 0 in reverse order. As the program traverses the column, output all the values in reverse order, 30 through 1.
hint: Your goal is to output the elements at the end of the column first and work back. The count should begin at the last element, which is the size of the column minus one. Then the count should go down from there. Finally, update the loop's boolean expression to stop once the count is less than zero.
